languages.text: "Вы правы. Без {g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}астропатов{/g} мы глухи и слепы, и многие другие псайкеры трудятся во благо человечества. Таково их место в замысле Императора — но только тех, кто принял свет Его и был санкционирован".

"You are right. Without the {g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}Astropaths{/g}, we are deaf and blind, and there are many other psykers labouring for the good of Humanity. That is their place within the Emperor's design — but only those among them who accept His light and have been authorised."
languages.original_text: "Вы правы. Без {g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}астропатов{/g} мы глухи и слепы, и многие другие псайкеры трудятся во благо человечества. Таково их место в замысле Императора — но только тех, кто принял свет Его и был санкционирован".

traits.locale_text: "You are right. Without the astropaths, we are deaf and blind, and there are many other psykers labouring for the good of Humanity. That is their place within the Emperor's design — but only those among them who accepted His light and have been authorised."

"You are right. Without the {g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}Astropaths{/g}, we are deaf and blind, and there are many other psykers labouring for the good of Humanity. That is their place within the Emperor's design — but only those among them who accept His light and have been authorised."

"You are right. Without the {g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}Astropaths{/g}, we are deaf and blind, and there are many other psykers labouring for the good of Humanity. That is their place within the Emperor's design — but only those among them who accept His light and have been authorised."

languages.text: « Vous avez raison. Nous serions sourds et aveugles sans les {g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}astropathes{/g}, et ce ne sont pas les seuls psykers qui œuvrent pour le bien de l'humanité. Telle est leur place dans le grand dessein de l'Empereur, mais uniquement ceux d'entre eux qui acceptent Sa lumière et reçoivent l'approbation des autorités. »
languages.original_text: "You are right. Without the {g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}Astropaths{/g}, we are deaf and blind, and there are many other psykers labouring for the good of Humanity. That is their place within the Emperor's design — but only those among them who accept His light and have been authorised."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez raison. Nous serions sourds et aveugles sans les astropathes, et ce ne sont pas les seuls psykers qui œuvrent pour le bien de l'humanité. Telle est leur place dans le grand dessein de l'Empereur, mais uniquement ceux d'entre eux qui acceptent Sa lumière et reçoivent l'approbation des autorités. »

« Vous avez raison. Nous serions sourds et aveugles sans les astropathes, et ce ne sont pas les seuls psykers qui œuvrent pour le bien de l'humanité. Telle est leur place dans le grand dessein de l'Empereur, mais uniquement ceux d'entre eux qui acceptent Sa lumière et reçoivent l'approbation des autorités. »

languages.text: «Está en lo cierto. Sin los {g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}astrópatas{/g} estaríamos ciegos y sordos, y no son pocos los psíquicos que desempeñan otras funciones por el bien de la Humanidad. Tal es su cometido según los designios del Emperador, pero solo para los que aceptan Su luz y han sido autorizados».
languages.original_text: "You are right. Without the {g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}Astropaths{/g}, we are deaf and blind, and there are many other psykers labouring for the good of Humanity. That is their place within the Emperor's design — but only those among them who accept His light and have been authorised."

traits.locale_text: «Está en lo cierto. Sin los astrópatas estaríamos ciegos y sordos, y no son pocos los psíquicos que desempeñan otras funciones por el bien de la Humanidad. Tal es su cometido según los designios del Emperador, pero solo para los que aceptan Su luz y han sido autorizados».

languages.text: “您说得没错。若是没有了{g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}星语者{/g}，我们就相当于失去了耳朵与双眼。除此之外，还有许多其他灵能者，他们都在为人类的福祉而努力，这也正是帝皇为他们安排的位置。然而，只有那些得到授权、沐浴在祂的明光下的灵能者，才能被视为帝国的忠仆。”
languages.original_text: "You are right. Without the {g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}Astropaths{/g}, we are deaf and blind, and there are many other psykers labouring for the good of Humanity. That is their place within the Emperor's design — but only those among them who accept His light and have been authorised."

traits.locale_text: “您说得没错。若是没有了星语者，我们就相当于失去了耳朵与双眼。除此之外，还有许多其他灵能者，他们都在为人类的福祉而努力，这也正是帝皇为他们安排的位置。然而，只有那些得到授权、沐浴在祂的明光下的灵能者，才能被视为帝国的忠仆。”

languages.text: 「確かにそうですね。{g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}感応通信官{/g}なしでは、私たちの目も耳も使い物にならない。人類のために働いている異能者たちは他にもたくさんいる。それが皇帝の中での彼らの位置だからです。しかし、彼らの中で皇帝の光を受け入れ、認可された者だけがそれを与えられています」
languages.original_text: "You are right. Without the {g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}Astropaths{/g}, we are deaf and blind, and there are many other psykers labouring for the good of Humanity. That is their place within the Emperor's design — but only those among them who accept His light and have been authorised."

traits.locale_text: 「確かにそうですね。感応通信官なしでは、私たちの目も耳も使い物にならない。人類のために働いている異能者たちは他にもたくさんいる。それが皇帝の中での彼らの位置だからです。しかし、彼らの中で皇帝の光を受け入れ、認可された者だけがそれを与えられています」

languages.text: "Ihr habt recht. Ohne die {g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}Astropathen{/g} sind wir taub und blind, und es gibt noch viele andere Psioniker, die für das Wohl der Menschheit arbeiten. Das ist ihr Platz im Plan des Imperators — doch nur für jene von ihnen, die sein Licht annehmen und eine Genehmigung erhalten."
languages.original_text: "You are right. Without the {g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}Astropaths{/g}, we are deaf and blind, and there are many other psykers labouring for the good of Humanity. That is their place within the Emperor's design — but only those among them who accept His light and have been authorised."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt recht. Ohne die Astropathen sind wir taub und blind, und es gibt noch viele andere Psioniker, die für das Wohl der Menschheit arbeiten. Das ist ihr Platz im Plan des Imperators — doch nur für jene von ihnen, die sein Licht annehmen und eine Genehmigung erhalten."

languages.text: "Haklısınız. {g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}Astropatlar{/g} olmadan bizler sağır ve körüz ve İnsanlığın iyiliği için gayret gösteren daha birçok ruhsezer de bulunmakta. Onların İmparator'un tasarımındaki yeri bu. Ancak yalnızca O'nun ışığını kabul edenlerin ve izni olanların."
languages.original_text: "You are right. Without the {g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}Astropaths{/g}, we are deaf and blind, and there are many other psykers labouring for the good of Humanity. That is their place within the Emperor's design — but only those among them who accept His light and have been authorised."
